result.reason: Support for multiple root nodes allows users to organize connections into distinct top-level hierarchies or load multiple connection files simultaneously.
result.approach: Refactor ConnectionsService to manage multiple RootNodeInfo instances and update XmlConnectionsSaver to support saving multiple roots, either to a single extended file or multiple linked files.

attempts.raw_output:
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "Support for multiple root nodes allows users to organize connections into distinct top-level hierarchies or load multiple connection files simultaneously.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": ["mRemoteNG/Connection/ConnectionsService.cs", "mRemoteNG/Config/Connections/XmlConnectionsSaver.cs"],
"approach": "Refactor ConnectionsService to manage multiple RootNodeInfo instances and update XmlConnectionsSaver to support saving multiple roots, either to a single extended file or multiple linked files."
